description: This file defines an 'Intro' page component for a quiz application. It imports UI components, theme styling, and constructs a layout with a header, a welcome card, and a start button that navigates to the quiz page on press.

classes.name: Intro
classes.description: A Lightning Component serving as the introductory page with title, welcome message, and start button.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the component's reactive state with layout, color, and text properties.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns the child components used within the layout, namely Card and Button.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up the button's onPress event to navigate to the '/quiz' route.
